# jzet-radio-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                               | Type                | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the radio-group. | `boolean`           | `undefined` |
| `flexDirection` | `flex-direction` | Sets the flex direction for the radio buttons.            | `"column" \| "row"` | `undefined` |
| `name`          | `name`           | Name for the radio buttons within this group              | `string`            | `undefined` |
| `value`         | `value`          | The value of the selected radio button.                   | `string`            | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type                  |
| -------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `valueChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
